channel.title: movies on NewsStreet
channel.description: Recent content in movies on NewsStreet

item.title: Jacqueline Fernandez Never Intended to Defame Nora Fatehi or Made Any Statement Against Her: Lawyer
item.description: Jacqueline Fernandez Never Intended to Defame Nora Fatehi or Made Any Statement Against Her: Lawyer Nora Fatehi has alleged that Jacqueline Fernandez made 'defamatory imputations' against her in Sukesh Chandrashekar’s money laundering case.

item.title: Vin Diesel Remembers Paul Walker On 9th Death Anniversary With Nostalgic Pic, Fast and Furious Fans Emotional
item.description: Vin Diesel Remembers Paul Walker On 9th Death Anniversary With Nostalgic Pic, Fast and Furious Fans Emotional Vin Diesel took to Instagram on his friend Pual Walker's ninth death anniversary and penned an emotional note alongside their throwback photo.

item.title: Laila Main Laila Singer Pawni Panday Says Meeting Shah Rukh Khan Was Her 'Life's Best Moment' | Exclusive
item.description: Laila Main Laila Singer Pawni Panday Says Meeting Shah Rukh Khan Was Her ‘Life’s Best Moment’ | Exclusive Laila Main Laila singer Pawni Panday recalls meeting Shah Rukh Khan at a party for Raees.

item.title: Kareena Kapoor Khan Can't Get Over Her 'Poo' Dialogues from K3G, and Neither Can We
item.description: Kareena Kapoor Khan Can’t Get Over Her ‘Poo’ Dialogues from K3G, and Neither Can We Kareena Kapoor Khan shared a mirror selfie on Saturday with one of the most iconic dialogues of her character Poo from Kabhie Khushi Kabhie Gham.

item.title: Vijay Fined Rs 500 By Chennai Traffic Police For Flouting Tinted Glass Norms
item.description: Vijay Fined Rs 500 By Chennai Traffic Police For Flouting Tinted Glass Norms As per the apex court, a vehicle's windows should be completely transparent.

item.title: Bigg Boss 16: Kushal Tandon Questions Sumbul's Father's Call, Slams Him For Speaking Ill About Tina
item.description: Bigg Boss 16: Kushal Tandon Questions Sumbul’s Father’s Call, Slams Him For Speaking Ill About Tina Former Bigg Boss contestant Kushal Tandon has questioned Bigg Boss 16 makers for allowing Sumbul to talk to her father.

item.title: Shah Rukh Khan's Mannat Gets New Diamond Name Plates, Fan Says 'The Palace of the King'
item.description: Shah Rukh Khan’s Mannat Gets New Diamond Name Plates, Fan Says ‘The Palace of the King’ Shah Rukh Khan's Mumbai house Mannat got new diamond nameplates.

item.title: Sunny Leone Sets Temperatures Soaring In This Leopard-Print Monokini
item.description: Sunny Leone Sets Temperatures Soaring In This Leopard-Print Monokini Sunny Leone will next be seen in the movie O My Ghost, written and directed by Yuvan.

item.title: Actor Krishna Passes Away; Delhi Courts Grants Bail To Jacqueline Fernandez In Rs 200 Cr Extortion Case
item.description: Actor Krishna Passes Away; Delhi Courts Grants Bail To Jacqueline Fernandez In Rs 200 Cr Extortion Case Krishna, veteran Telugu actor-producer and Mahesh Babu’s father passed away; Delhi's Patiala House court grants bail to Jacqueline Fernandez in Rs 200 crore extortion case.

item.title: B'day Special: Raja Hindustani to Raja Babu, Blockbusters Juhi Chawla Rejected
item.description: B’day Special: Raja Hindustani to Raja Babu, Blockbusters Juhi Chawla Rejected Although Juhi was the first choice for Dil Toh Pagal Hai, the actress did not want to play a supporting role.

item.title: Shah Rukh Khan Receives First Global Icon of Cinema and Cultural Narrative Award In UAE
item.description: Shah Rukh Khan Receives First Global Icon of Cinema and Cultural Narrative Award In UAE King Khan has been felicitated with the award for his contribution to the cultural landscape, and development in the field of writing and creativity.

item.title: Disha Patani Strips Down to Red Hot Bikini, Raises Temperature in Sexy Instagram Pics
item.description: Disha Patani Strips Down to Red Hot Bikini, Raises Temperature in Sexy Instagram Pics Disha Patani sends temperatures soaring as she bares her sizzling body in tiny red bikini.

item.title: 'Mad Rush to Build Body Dangerous': Vivek Agnihotri on Siddhaanth Surryavanshi's Death
item.description: ‘Mad Rush to Build Body Dangerous’: Vivek Agnihotri on Siddhaanth Surryavanshi’s Death Expressing his grief on the actor’s untimely demise, Vivek Agnihotri spoke on the trend of hyper gymming

item.title: Malaika Arora Raises Temperature in Her Neon Athleisure as She is Clicked Outside Her Yoga Class, See Pics
item.description: Malaika Arora Raises Temperature in Her Neon Athleisure as She is Clicked Outside Her Yoga Class, See Pics Before entering her yoga class, Malaika Arora waved at the paparazzi and was later seen running towards the entrance.

item.title: Shah Rukh Khan Looks Dapper in Black as He Attends Diwali Bash; Nayanthara-Vignesh Wish Fans on Diwali With Their Twins
item.description: Shah Rukh Khan Looks Dapper in Black as He Attends Diwali Bash; Nayanthara-Vignesh Wish Fans on Diwali With Their Twins Shah Rukh Khan can be seen looking dapper in a black kurta as he reaches Red Chillies' office.
